# PortalComponent.Plane

**Structure**

A representation of a portal as an infinite plane.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Plane
```

## Overview

Enable the corresponding clipping and crossing features by passing this value in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/ClippingMode-swift.enum/plane(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/CrossingMode-swift.enum/plane(_:)].

RealityKit defines the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/position] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/normal] properties in entity local space.

The following default values are available:

- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/positiveX]
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/negativeX]
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/positiveY]
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/negativeY]
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/positiveZ]
- [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/Plane/negativeZ]

See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent] for example usage.

## Initializers

- **init(position:normal:)**: Creates a portal plane with position and normal.

## Instance Properties

- **normal**: The normal of the portal plane, in entity local space.
- **position**: The position of the portal plane, in entity local space.

## Type Properties

- **negativeX**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the negative x direction.
- **negativeY**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the negative y direction.
- **negativeZ**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the negative z direction.
- **positiveX**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the positive x direction.
- **positiveY**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the positive y direction.
- **positiveZ**: A portal plane sitting at the origin facing the positive z direction.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
